title: Typographic Knowledge versus Counterfeiters
content: After learning about high-quality counterfeit Magic cards that are circulating, I found the page [http://imgur.com/a/hLuw2](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804015844/http:/imgur.com/a/hLuw2) which shows that they do have significant detectable flaws.
author: quadibloc

comments.content: Fascinating. You probably wouldn't even notice if you're not aware of fakes being distributed.
